name: radon_mod
title: A modified version of the Radon contamination dataset of Gelman and Hill (2006)
description:
Modified Radon data set containing data of radon levels in three hundred eighty-six different counties in the USA. 

 - N: number of observations
  - J: number of counties  
  - x: floor measurements
  - y: log-radon measurements
  - u: county uranium reading
  - county: counties
  - holdout: is in holdout set
